locations.name: Ruaha National Park
locations.description: One of Tanzania's largest and least-visited protected areas, known for its wild, remote safari experience, dramatic landscapes with baobabs, large lion prides, significant elephant populations, and a sense of vast seclusion.

locations.name: Pemba Island
locations.description: A lush, green island north of Zanzibar, offering a more authentic and peaceful escape with turquoise waters, spectacular coral reefs for diving/snorkelling, secluded beaches, and spice plantations.
